review: "Sqaq L-Infern" is a delightful surprise, especially within the realm of Maltese fantasy literature. The book's engaging plot, rich in mystery and adventure, kept me hooked from the first page to the last. The characters are well-developed and the pacing is just right, making it a truly captivating read. The blend of historical and fantastical elements is well-executed, adding depth and originality to the story. This book exceeded my expectations and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a well-crafted, immersive fantasy experience.
